verses.verse: וּבֶן־ הֲדַ֣ד <WH1130> And Benhadad מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> the king אֲרָ֗ם <WH758> of Syria קָבַץ֙ <WH6908> together אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all חֵיל֔וֹ <WH2426> army וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֨ים <WH7970> and [there were] thirty וּשְׁנַ֥יִם <WH8147> and two מֶ֛לֶךְ <WH4428> kings אִתּ֖וֹ <WH854> for וְס֣וּס <WH5483> with him and horses וָרָ֑כֶב <WH7393> and chariots וַיַּ֗עַל <WH5927> and he went up וַיָּ֙צַר֙ <WH6696> and besieged עַל־ <WH5921> and שֹׁ֣מְר֔וֹן <WH8111> Samaria וַיִּלָּ֖חֶם <WH3898> and warred בָּֽהּ׃
וַיִּשְׁלַ֧ח <WH7971> And he sent מַלְאָכִ֛ים <WH4397> messengers אֶל־ <WH413> to אַחְאָ֥ב <WH256> to Ahab מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel הָעִֽירָה׃ <WH5892> into the city

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> answer ל֗וֹ כֹּ֚ה <WH3541> such אָמַ֣ר <WH559> answer בֶּן־ הֲדַ֔ד <WH1130> Ben-hadad כַּסְפְּךָ֥ <WH3701> Thy silver וּֽזְהָבְךָ֖ <WH2091> and thy gold לִֽי־ ה֑וּא <WH1931> he וְנָשֶׁ֧יךָ <WH802> [is] mine thy wives וּבָנֶ֛יךָ <WH1121> also and thy children הַטּוֹבִ֖ים <WH2896> [even] the goodliest לִי־ הֵֽם׃ <WH1992> like

וַיַּ֤עַן <WH6030> answered מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> And the king יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel וַיֹּ֔אמֶר <WH559> and said כִּדְבָרְךָ֖ <WH1697> according to thy saying אֲדֹנִ֣י <WH113> My lord הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> O king לְךָ֥ אֲנִ֖י <WH589> I am וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after לִֽי׃

וַיָּשֻׁ֙בוּ֙ <WH7725> came again הַמַּלְאָכִ֔ים <WH4397> And the messengers וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <WH559> and said כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֥ר <WH559> Thus speaketh בֶּן־ הֲדַ֖ד <WH1130> Benhadad לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Surely שָׁלַ֤חְתִּי <WH7971> Although I have sent אֵלֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH413> to you לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> unto thee saying כַּסְפְּךָ֧ <WH3701> me thy silver וּזְהָבְךָ֛ <WH2091> and thy gold וְנָשֶׁ֥יךָ <WH802> and thy wives וּבָנֶ֖יךָ <WH1121> and thy children לִ֥י תִתֵּֽן׃ <WH5414> Thou shalt deliver

כִּ֣י ׀ <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> but כָּעֵ֣ת <WH6256> about this time מָחָ֗ר <WH4279> unto thee to morrow אֶשְׁלַ֤ח <WH7971> Yet I will send אֶת־ <WH853> עֲבָדַי֙ <WH5650> my servants אֵלֶ֔יךָ <WH413> to you וְחִפְּשׂוּ֙ <WH2664> and they shall search אֶת־ <WH853> בֵּ֣יתְךָ֔ <WH1004> thine house וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> בָּתֵּ֣י <WH1004> and the houses עֲבָדֶ֑יךָ <WH5650> of thy servants וְהָיָה֙ <WH1961> and it shall be כָּל־ <WH3605> and whatever מַחְמַ֣ד <WH4261> [that] whatsoever is pleasant עֵינֶ֔יךָ <WH5869> in thine eyes יָשִׂ֥ימוּ <WH7760> they shall put בְיָדָ֖ם <WH3027> [it] in their hand וְלָקָֽחוּ׃ <WH3947> and take [it] away

וַיִּקְרָ֤א <WH7121> called מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> Then the king יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel לְכָל־ <WH3605> all זִקְנֵ֣י <WH2205> all the elders הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> of the land וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> and said דְּעֽוּ־ <WH3045> Mark נָ֣א <WH4994> Please וּרְא֔וּ <WH7200> I pray you and see כִּ֥י <WH3588> how רָעָ֖ה <WH7451> mischief זֶ֣ה <WH2088> this מְבַקֵּ֑שׁ <WH1245> how this [man] seeketh כִּֽי־ <WH3588> how שָׁלַ֨ח <WH7971> for he sent אֵלַ֜י <WH413> to me לְנָשַׁ֤י <WH802> unto me for my wives וּלְבָנַי֙ <WH1121> and for my children וּלְכַסְפִּ֣י <WH3701> and for my silver וְלִזְהָבִ֔י <WH2091> and for my gold וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> did not מָנַ֖עְתִּי <WH4513> and I denied מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ <WH4480> at

וַיֹּאמְר֥וּ <WH559> said אֵלָ֛יו <WH413> about כָּל־ <WH3605> All הַזְּקֵנִ֖ים <WH2205> And all the elders וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all הָעָ֑ם <WH5971> and all the people אַל־ <WH408> not תִּשְׁמַ֖ע <WH8085> unto him Hearken וְל֥וֹא <WH3808> or תֹאבֶֽה׃ <WH14> not [unto him] nor consent

וַיֹּ֜אמֶר <WH559> Wherefore he said לְמַלְאֲכֵ֣י <WH4397> unto the messengers בֶן־ הֲדַ֗ד <WH1130> of Benhadad אִמְר֞וּ <WH559> Tell לַֽאדֹנִ֤י <WH113> my lord הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> the king כֹּל֩ <WH3605> All אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> you שָׁלַ֨חְתָּ <WH7971> All that thou didst send אֶל־ <WH413> to עַבְדְּךָ֤ <WH5650> for to thy servant בָרִֽאשֹׁנָה֙ <WH7223> at the first אֶעֱשֶׂ֔ה <WH6213> I will do וְהַדָּבָ֣ר <WH1697> but this thing הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> this לֹ֥א <WH3808> not אוּכַ֖ל <WH3201> I may לַעֲשׂ֑וֹת <WH6213> not do וַיֵּֽלְכוּ֙ <WH1980> departed הַמַּלְאָכִ֔ים <WH4397> And the messengers וַיְשִׁבֻ֖הוּ <WH7725> again דָּבָֽר׃ <WH1697> him word

וַיִּשְׁלַ֤ח <WH7971> sent אֵלָיו֙ <WH413> about בֶּן־ הֲדַ֔ד <WH1130> And Benhadad וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> unto him and said כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> so יַעֲשׂ֥וּן <WH6213> do so לִ֛י אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> The gods וְכֹ֣ה <WH3541> also יוֹסִ֑פוּ <WH3254> unto me and more also אִם־ <WH518> if יִשְׂפֹּק֙ <WH5606> shall suffice עֲפַ֣ר <WH6083> if the dust שֹׁמְר֔וֹן <WH8111> of Samaria לִשְׁעָלִ֕ים <WH8168> for handfuls לְכָל־ <WH3605> for all הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> for all the people אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who בְּרַגְלָֽי׃ <WH7272> that follow

וַיַּ֤עַן <WH6030> answered מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> And the king יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> and said דַּבְּר֔וּ <WH1696> Tell אַל־ <WH408> nay יִתְהַלֵּ֥ל <WH1984> on [his harness] boast חֹגֵ֖ר <WH2296> [him] Let not him that girdeth כִּמְפַתֵּֽחַ׃ <WH6605> himself as he that putteth it off

וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> become כִּשְׁמֹ֙עַ֙ <WH8085> And it came to pass when [Benhadad] heard אֶת־ <WH853> הַדָּבָ֣ר <WH1697> this message הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> this וְה֥וּא <WH1931> he שֹׁתֶ֛ה <WH8354> as he [was] drinking ה֥וּא <WH1931> he וְהַמְּלָכִ֖ים <WH4428> he and the kings בַּסֻּכּ֑וֹת <WH5521> in the pavilions וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> that he said אֶל־ <WH413> to his עֲבָדָיו֙ <WH5650> unto his servants שִׂ֔ימוּ <WH7760> Set וַיָּשִׂ֖ימוּ <WH7760> [yourselves in array] And they set עַל־ <WH5921> against הָעִֽיר׃ <WH5892> [themselves in array] against the city

וְהִנֵּ֣ה ׀ <WH2009> now behold נָבִ֣יא <WH5030> prophet אֶחָ֗ד <WH259> a נִגַּשׁ֮ <WH5066> And behold there came אֶל־ <WH413> about אַחְאָ֣ב <WH256> unto Ahab מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king יִשְׂרָאֵל֒ <WH3478> of Israel וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> saying כֹּ֚ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD הְֽרָאִ֔יתָ <WH7200> Hast thou seen אֵ֛ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הֶהָמ֥וֹן <WH1995> abundance הַגָּד֖וֹל <WH1419> all this great הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> this הִנְנִ֨י <WH2005> behold נֹתְנ֤וֹ <WH5414> will deliver בְיָֽדְךָ֙ <WH3027> it into thine hand הַיּ֔וֹם <WH3117> this day וְיָדַעְתָּ֖ <WH3045> and thou shalt know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> that I [am] the LORD

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said אַחְאָב֙ <WH256> And Ahab בְּמִ֔י <WH4310> Who וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> By whom? And he said כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD בְּנַעֲרֵ֖י <WH5288> [Even] by the young men שָׂרֵ֣י <WH8269> of the princes הַמְּדִינ֑וֹת <WH4082> of the provinces וַיֹּ֛אמֶר <WH559> Then he said מִֽי־ <WH4310> Who יֶאְסֹ֥ר <WH631> Who shall order הַמִּלְחָמָ֖ה <WH4421> battle וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> says אָֽתָּה׃ <WH859> he

וַיִּפְקֹ֗ד <WH6485> Then he numbered אֶֽת־ <WH853> נַעֲרֵי֙ <WH5288> the young men שָׂרֵ֣י <WH8269> of the princes הַמְּדִינ֔וֹת <WH4082> of the provinces וַיִּהְי֕וּ <WH1961> become מָאתַ֖יִם <WH3967> hundred שְׁנַ֣יִם <WH8147> and they were two וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֑ים <WH7970> and thirty וְאַחֲרֵיהֶ֗ם <WH310> and after פָּקַ֧ד <WH6485> them he numbered אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָעָ֛ם <WH5971> all the people כָּל־ <WH3605> all בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> [even] all the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel שִׁבְעַ֥ת <WH7651> [being] seven אֲלָפִֽים׃ <WH505> thousand

וַיֵּצְא֖וּ <WH3318> And they went out בַּֽצָּהֳרָ֑יִם <WH6672> at noon וּבֶן־ הֲדַד֩ <WH1130> But Benhadad שֹׁתֶ֨ה <WH8354> [was] drinking שִׁכּ֜וֹר <WH7910> himself drunk בַּסֻּכּ֗וֹת <WH5521> in the pavilions ה֧וּא <WH1931> he וְהַמְּלָכִ֛ים <WH4428> he and the kings שְׁלֹשִֽׁים־ <WH7970> the thirty וּשְׁנַ֥יִם <WH8147> and two מֶ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> kings עֹזֵ֥ר <WH5826> that helped אֹתֽוֹ׃ <WH853>

וַיֵּצְא֗וּ <WH3318> went out נַעֲרֵ֛י <WH5288> And the young men שָׂרֵ֥י <WH8269> of the princes הַמְּדִינ֖וֹת <WH4082> of the provinces בָּרִֽאשֹׁנָ֑ה <WH7223> first וַיִּשְׁלַ֣ח <WH7971> sent out בֶּן־ הֲדַ֗ד <WH1130> and Benhadad וַיַּגִּ֤ידוּ <WH5046> and they told לוֹ֙ לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> him saying אֲנָשִׁ֕ים <WH582> There are men יָצְא֖וּ <WH3318> come out מִשֹּׁמְרֽוֹן׃ <WH8111> of Samaria

וַיֹּ֛אמֶר <WH559> And he said אִם־ <WH518> If לְשָׁל֥וֹם <WH7965> for peace יָצָ֖אוּ <WH3318> Whether they be come out תִּפְשׂ֣וּם <WH8610> take חַיִּ֑ים <WH2416> them alive וְאִ֧ם <WH518> if לְמִלְחָמָ֛ה <WH4421> for war יָצָ֖אוּ <WH3318> or whether they be come out חַיִּ֥ים <WH2416> them alive תִּפְשֽׂוּם׃ <WH8610> take

וְאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <WH428> these יָצְא֣וּ <WH3318> came out מִן־ <WH4480> from הָעִ֔יר <WH5892> of the city נַעֲרֵ֖י <WH5288> So these young men שָׂרֵ֣י <WH8269> of the princes הַמְּדִינ֑וֹת <WH4082> of the provinces וְהַחַ֖יִל <WH2428> and the army אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which אַחֲרֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH310> which followed

וַיַּכּוּ֙ <WH5221> And they slew אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> every one אִישׁ֔וֹ <WH376> his man וַיָּנֻ֣סוּ <WH5127> fled אֲרָ֔ם <WH758> and the Syrians וַֽיִּרְדְּפֵ֖ם <WH7291> pursued יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> and Israel וַיִּמָּלֵ֗ט <WH4422> escaped בֶּן־ הֲדַד֙ <WH1130> them and Benhadad מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> the king אֲרָ֔ם <WH758> of Syria עַל־ <WH5921> on ס֖וּס <WH5483> on an horse וּפָרָשִֽׁים׃ <WH6571> with the horsemen

וַיֵּצֵא֙ <WH3318> went out מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> And the king יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel וַיַּ֥ךְ <WH5221> and smote אֶת־ <WH853> הַסּ֖וּס <WH5483> the horses וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָרָ֑כֶב <WH7393> and chariots וְהִכָּ֥ה <WH5221> and slew בַאֲרָ֖ם <WH758> the Syrians מַכָּ֥ה <WH4347> slaughter גְדוֹלָֽה׃ <WH1419> with a great

וַיִּגַּ֤שׁ <WH5066> came הַנָּבִיא֙ <WH5030> And the prophet אֶל־ <WH413> to מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> to the king יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> and said לוֹ֙ לֵ֣ךְ <WH1980> Go הִתְחַזַּ֔ק <WH2388> strengthen וְדַ֥ע <WH3045> thyself and mark וּרְאֵ֖ה <WH7200> and see אֵ֣ת <WH853> אֲשֶֽׁר־ <WH834> what תַּעֲשֶׂ֑ה <WH6213> what thou doest כִּ֚י <WH3588> at לִתְשׁוּבַ֣ת <WH8666> for at the return הַשָּׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> of the year מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> the king אֲרָ֖ם <WH758> of Syria עֹלֶ֥ה <WH5927> will come up עָלֶֽיךָ׃ <WH5921> against ס
